basics.name: Douglas McKinley
basics.label: Patent Examiner, Machine Learning Engineer, Web Developer

work.name: USPTO
work.summary: Examined patent applications in AI art, including novel ML architectures, hardware acceleration, and related fields.

work.name: SinglePayNews LLC
work.summary: Developed a PERN stack web application running on AWS, hired and managed junior developers and senior contractors, and handled project management, funding, and customer acquisition.

work.name: Seattle Department of Transportation
work.summary: Fixed and maintained the Permit Tracking System, debugging a 20,000-line Python monolith, conducting forensic data analysis, and correcting faulty records impacting projects valued in the hundreds of millions.

work.name: Central Washington University
work.summary: Taught 9 unique undergraduate computer science courses, developed 4 novel courses in web development, programming languages, software engineering, and computer networks.

work.name: DealerChimp LLC
work.summary: Automated shopping for used cars on Craigslist using supervised classification with Python, Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow, Selenium, and SQL.

work.name: Astronics AES
work.summary: Automated manufacturing steps for a 3-phase 480v to 24vdc conversion unit using C++, Python, and FAA compliance test automation.

work.name: QMSI
work.summary: Implemented ladder logic PLCs and conducted configuration and bring-up of Fanuc 6-axis robotic arms.

work.name: Pacific Northwest National Lab
work.summary: Conducted RF tests for DoD projects, writing software in MATLAB, Simulink, C++, and Python, and designed circuit schematics using Verilog and LTSpice.

projects.name: Project Premonition
projects.description: Winning team for SLAM algorithm in UAV; implemented waypoint navigation in quadcopter UAV with ROS.

projects.name: Force Control with BAXTER Robotic Arm
projects.description: Implemented compliant manipulation using 6DOF kinematics in MATLAB and Python/ROS.

projects.name: GizzardElectric PowerBikes
projects.description: Designed and built an 18650 cell array battery for an electric bike, writing firmware for BMS and motor drive control.

projects.name: Air Quality Analysis in Eastern Washington
projects.description: Conducted analysis on seasonal wildfires in Washington using data from WA State Dept. of Ecology and GeoPandas.
